subtitle: Computational Physics | Java | Python
about_text: I have 4 years of experience with problem solving and teamwork. Experience developing projects involving Python, Java, and database MySQL. Through my educational experience at Instituto Federal Fluminense, I have learned to build web applications using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SASS, GIT, NumPy, Pandas, and SciPy.

projects.title: Z-score (Statistical Test)
projects.description: Statistics is a crucial tool for science, business, and economics. This project makes a statistical test 15x faster than humans and much more secure from mistakes.

projects.title: Condensed Matter (Physics)
projects.description: This project returns the crystal system based on your data about the axes and angles.

projects.title: Work order Management
projects.description: Still under development, this project uses Java and MySQL for a system for controlling Service Order.
